column2: Powerbridge Technologies Co. Ltd. is engaged in the provision of software application and technology solutions to corporate and government customers. The company is headquartered in Zhuhai, Guangdong and currently employs 299 full-time employees. The firm designs and develops cloud-based Powerbridge BaaS Services (blockchain-as-a-service) that is intended for all players in the global trade ecosystem. The Companyâ€™s technology platforms include Powerbridge System Platform and Powerbridge SaaS Platform.
